channel.title: Help with giveadmin and mod and owner commands for pimpscape source
channel.description: whats the code for ::giveadmin mod and owner command with playerrights not name

item.title: Help with giveadmin and mod and owner commands for pimpscape source
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights > 2) { try { String s = command.substring(10); Player p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerId(s); client c = (client) p; c.playerRights = 2; c.disconnected = true; sendMessage("Player Rights 2 given to " + c.playerName); } catch (Exception) { sendMessage("Error applying new player rights"); } }

You may have to change some of the syntax, I just wrote this off the top of my head.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with giveadmin and mod and owner commands for pimpscape source
